title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1130/89 of 24 April 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2511/69 laying down special measures for improving the production and marketing of Community citrus fruit following the frosts that occurred in the winter of 1986/1987
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 1130/89
of 24 April 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2511/69 laying down special measures for improving the production and marketing of Community citrus fruit following the frosts that occurred in the winter of 1986/1987
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 24 April 1989.
For the Council
The President
F. FERNANDEZ ORDOĂEZ
